Articles.Content:
Very rarely my plane would just start losing parts and then structural integrity while returning from space to KSC. That usually happens near (within ~20km) to KSC but sometimes as far as a few hundred kilometers. I have experienced this bug on 0.25 and earlier releases.

I do have quite a few mods but on I've found a thread reddit describing identical bug occurring on unmodded 0.24.

Complete mod list:

Toolbar 1.7.7

Bucky's Instruments

DeadlyReentry

KerbalJointReinforcement

NEAR

ProceduralFairings

Lazor Docking Cam

AC Life Support

Kerbal Alarm Clock

MechJeb 2.4.0

Editor Extensions

SQUAD pls fix

Yes, this is a known bug that is present in the official Squad bug tracker. Hopefully it will get addressed soon though it is very difficult to repeat in a reproducible way which makes it much harder to track down the cause and fix it...

I may upload quicksave file after which (quicksave) it occurrs (or at least happend twice to me) if necessary.

Edited November 11, 2014 by El wonso
I'm gonna bump because I've just noticed it only (?) affects non-rectangular shaped wings.
